message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, you get a small share.  We can work out a better deal in the future if you accept this.
I'm not afraid to start with a tough stance. Will you reconsider?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile for me.  Let's split it more evenly.
I'm not budging on the split, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the amount.
I'm making a final offer.  I need a decent share to make this worthwhile.  Accept this, or we'll both end up with less due to inflation.
